titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to H. M. McCarty
CWG13654

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To H. M. McCarty Dr

row.cell: " 4 Imperial Negro Muster & Descriptive Roll Books @ $24 --

body.p: I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service, and will be reported on my return of for the month ending the day of 1865.
Captain and Assistant Quarter-Master Ky. Vols. Adjt Genl Ky

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 6 of April, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of One hundred and eleven Dollars and seventy five Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 118 Abstract "B2" Qr. 186.
H. M. McCarty
Dollars 11175/100
Paid 6th April, 1865
Stationary
285
